eya ese wuwada apa thathagathayano siyalla dana wadala siyalu karana sasara katharin ethera wi mokshaya labaganumatama nowana bawa datha manaya.ee kimda yath mokshaya labagatha yuththawu margayada penwa aanapanasathiyada desa wadala bawini.ese winam me sa mahath wu suthra deshana nishpala wannehi yayi nosithu manaya.ee manda yath eda wadayata wannangen pawathena parapura kalpanthaya thekma yali yali mathuwana niyawa thunkal dakna gothamayo awabodha kota gena mathu parapure yamekuhata wadayata yam sandaha siyalu karana wadala bawina.ekalhi lamaka pahath widyayayi anudana wadalada misadituwange man bindinu was tharaka widyawaya,jiwa widyawaya wani widya upayogi karagaththe yam seda, wathman misadituwange man elesinma binda dama ,shri saddharmayata mahath aalokayak genadennawu dharmadharayan kottashayak da un wahansege pinata pahalawa aththahuya.ee ketharam sewayakda yath batahira anukarakawadinge ,misadituwange nodiyunu tharaka widyawaya, kwontam wadaya, samanthara wishwayaya yanadi wada ha widya upayogi kotagenada,kalala widyawaya ,praweni widyaya,jana widyaya,anuka jana widyaya upayogi kotagenada thripitakaya niwaradi yayi oppukota penwa ee samagama thripitakaya upayogi kotagena eki siyalu widya nodiyunu saha sawdya yayi oppukirimata tharam dakshawannahuya.mekala ema parapurata kawarahu ayath wannoda nam (ha )barana ganitha salinda nilwa,issaraha amune ralalage nathiwuna ra migayada,kalaladhari dinum alankara yayida,datha yuththaha.thawada misadituwan nam wanahi thabuda,bahira migayada, pu hu ala thissayada,nohonda hitha wana bawath therum gatha manaya.
balu balmata me dinaya gana hasyayak upadina namuth me wisheshitha dinaya lokaye apa katath athishaya wadagath dinayak we.
